name: ContactsTab
functionalRequirements:
## Contacts Tab

### Purpose
Displays and manages contact information in a tabular format.

### Features
- Contact list display
- Search and filter
- Sort by columns
- Contact details view
technicalDesign:
## Implementation

### Props
- contacts: Array of contact records
- onContactSelect: Contact selection handler
- filters: Active filters

properties.name: contacts
properties.type: Array<{id: string, firstName: string, lastName: string, email: string, phone: string, company: string, title: string}>

properties.name: onContactSelect
properties.type: (contact: {id: string, firstName: string, lastName: string}) => void
